CQF Jan 2011 - Final Project

Packages
com.luigisgro.cqf This package contains the code for the Final Project of the Certificate in Quantitative Finance, cohort January 2011.
com.luigisgro.cqf.curve Interest rate curves and curve time-series data types for HJM processing
com.luigisgro.cqf.curve.loaders A collection of utility classes that can parse interest rate historical data and generate new CurveTimeSeries
com.luigisgro.cqf.fdm All the Finite Difference Method code is contained in this package
com.luigisgro.cqf.function A light model of scalar functions, used within the HJM framework to model volatility functions
com.luigisgro.cqf.hjm Core package with the implementation of the Monte Carlo simulation framework MultiFactorModel specifically for the HJM model (MultiFactorHJM) and the implementation of some interest rate derivative models to be used with it.
com.luigisgro.cqf.job This package contains the high-level implementation of the complete processing for: HJM: HJMJob FDM: FDMJob together with support classes to read job configuration from property files.
com.luigisgro.cqf.linalg A light linear algebra library, relying on lazy evaluation and immutable object where convenient
com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo The Monte Carlo framework, in a generic implementation for curve time series, with a generic number of factors.
com.luigisgro.cqf.pca Implementation of the Principal Component Analysis needed for the HJM model.
com.luigisgro.cqf.util A few utility interfaces and classes generic enough to not fit in any other package
